param.name: published
param.label: Published
param.description: Choose whether or not to publish the attorneys information.

param.name: access
param.label: Access Level
param.description: Set the frontend access level of the attorney information.

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show Title
param.description: Choose whether or not to display the title above the map.

param.name: show_description
param.label: Show Description
param.description: Choose whether or not to display the description under the map.

param.name: center_lat
param.label: Center Latitude
param.description: The latitude coordinate for the center of the map.

param.name: center_lng
param.label: Center Longitude
param.description: The longitude coordinate for the center of the map.

param.name: zoom
param.label: Zoom Level
param.description: The default zoom level for the lap when initially displayed. This should be an integer between 1 and 20. The lower the number, the further the view is zoomed out.
